episodes.title: Former Jehovah's Witness Testimony Part 2
episodes.description:
Katja and Christian's stories are harrowing as they are triumphant. It is sad that they had to live for years within such an oppresive organization. But they have found new freedom now, and a new truth in His love. From the television show "This Is Your Story" on Yes TV.
Produced by Robert Melnichuk.

Thank you for watching. Please DO NOT SUBSCRIBE to this channel if you are looking for exjw activism videos. This is a travel and sailing around the world channel. But... if you would like to watch our journey as we venture into a new life, you can subscribe and hit the notification bell. We are so excited to have you come along and be part of our family!

We have been given full permission to upload this video.
